study.name: Posner Test
study.description: Posner Test is a test of your attention.
study.consent: This experiment will not put you in any danger. Pinky Promise?
study.instructions: General Instruction: You will fixate on the center point on the screen. Click left if the left point blinks. Click right if the right point blinks. More detailed instructions will be provided later.
study.eligibility: This test is specialized toward people with lesions in the cerebellum. You must be screened by the doctor first.
study.reward: $12/hr and free imaging of your brain.

stage.name: EGG Installation
stage.description: At this tage, an assistant will install EGG hat on your head.
stage.instructions: Follow the instructions provided by the assistant.

stage.name: Posner Task I
stage.instructions: There are three points on the screen. Focus your eye on the central point. Put your hand on your mouse. Click either of the buttons on the mouse to start the test. The left and right points will blink arbritarily. Click left when the left point blinks and click right when the right point blinks. Occassionally, other objects may appear on the screen, do not be alaramed.

stage.name: Posner Task II
stage.instructions: The instruction is the same with the first one. There are three points on the screen. Focus your eye on the central point. Put your hand on your mouse.
